fonts.label: H1
fonts.text:
This one is the sub-section or
widget title

fonts.label: H2
fonts.text:
Next one is the item title inside
widgets

fonts.label: H3
fonts.text: This is a label or CTA text

fonts.label: Body
fonts.text:
This is the body text which is used for most
of the design, like paragraphs, lists, etc.
